## z-scores

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
x_vec = rnorm(25, mean = 5, sd = 4)

(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)

z_scores = function(x) {
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  return(z)
}

z_scores(x = x_vec)

y_vec = rnorm(40, mean = 12, sd = 0.3)

z_scores(y_vec)
```



```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

z_scores = function(x) {
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("x needs to be numeric")
  }
  if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("x should have at least 3 numbers")
  }
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  return(z)
}


```
